item.title: JPMorgan upgrades consumer goods stock on confidence in second-half acceleration
item.description: JPMorgan sees shares of Procter & Gamble rising 11% from current levels.

item.title: Roth says this biopharma stock has room to run on drug momentum, upcoming trial catalysts
item.description: Roth's $212 price target implies an additional upside of 32% for shares of Insmed, which have already rallied 160% in the last 12 months.

item.title: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The three major averages jumped for a second consecutive session Thursday, with the Dow Industrials wiping out the week's losses.
